title: [HOLD for payment 2023-09-20] [$1000] Dev/Staging: No "From Email" in IOU header when offline
issue_repo_steps: Action performed: 1. Login to any account 2. Click Profile > Preferences > Toggle on Offline mode 3. Press the `+` button in the LHN and Request Money from a person you've never chatted with before. 4. Click on the IOU card that shows up in the new chat. 5. Notice the "from email" is missing as compared to an online Request Money Online (expected behaviour) Offline (missing "From Email X") Expected result: The header should show a `From email` subtitle, clicking on which leads you back to the chat. Actual result: None
